415560.name: Fantasy Grounds - Rolemaster Classic: Dún Crú
415560.description:
RMC: Dun Cru

Deep within the Dark Woods of the kingdom of Archendurn is a ruined fortress, Dún Crú. Rumors say that it has become the lair of bandits or evil goblins. Legends say that it is haunted by the spirits of its garrison. Are you brave enough to seek answers to the mysteries of Dún Crú?
Dún Crú is a complete adventure module for Rolemaster Classic. Designed for parties of 4th to 6th-level characters, encounters can be scaled upwards or downwards to suit the GM's needs. Dún Crú is a sequel to the City of Archendurn setting module, but may be used in almost any fantasy setting
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Jeremy Wilkerson, and Jokomotion
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:  Jokomotion[/b]
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Rolemaster Classic ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
